column4: Please, help: I was trying to recover the Windows mbr through Ubuntu with ms-sys --mbr /dev/sda1 instead of /dev/sda, and now my windows partition is unbootable...
not so bad, it could be worse, k so what you did was enter some mumbel jumbel insto the boot loader, now try doing the same thing you did using hd0 instead
Hum, ok... I'll try that. Tks for now
just solved the broken winodws boot sector with testdisk (backup bs function). Thanks
